sorcer.core.provider.exertmonitor.db

Class SessionDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.core.provider.exertmonitor.db.SessionDatabase

  • public class SessionDatabase
extends Object
    SessionDatabase defines the storage containers for the ExertMonitor database.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SessionDatabase(String homeDirectory)
      Open all storage containers and catalogs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close all stores (closing a store automatically closes its indices).
      com.sleepycat.bind.serial.StoredClassCatalog getClassCatalog()
      Return the class catalog.
      com.sleepycat.je.Environment getEnvironment()
      Return the storage environment for the database.
      com.sleepycat.je.Database getSessionDatabase()
      Return the monitor session storage container.
